hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
sudo su - root<<FEOF
cd /etc/yum.repos.d #cat openEuler.repo cp openEuler.repo /etc/yum.repos.d/openEuler.repo.bak ( cat <<EOF
[everything-x86-64] name=everything-x86-64 baseurl=http://121.36.84.172/dailybuild/openEuler-22.03-LTS/test_openeuler-2022-03-26-09-36-49/everything/x86_64/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=1 gpgkey=http://121.36.84.172/dailybuild/openEuler-22.03-LTS/test_openeuler-2022-03-26-09-36-49/everything/x86_64/RPM-GPG-KEY-openEuler
[everything-aarch64] name=everything-aarch64 baseurl=http://121.36.84.172/dailybuild/openEuler-22.03-LTS/test_openeuler-2022-03-26-09-36-49/everything/aarch64/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=1 gpgkey=http://121.36.84.172/dailybuild/openEuler-22.03-LTS/test_openeuler-2022-03-26-09-36-49/everything/aarch64/RPM-GPG-KEY-openEuler
[source] name=source baseurl=http://121.36.84.172/dailybuild/openEuler-22.03-LTS/test_openeuler-2022-03-26-09-36-49/source/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=1 gpgkey=http://121.36.84.172/dailybuild/openEuler-22.03-LTS/test_openeuler-2022-03-26-09-36-49/source/RPM-GPG-KEY-openEuler
EOF ) > /etc/yum.repos.d/openEuler.repo ttime1=`date +"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"` echo $ttime1 dnf info abattis-cantarell-fonts dnf info 389-ds-base ttime2=`date +"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"` echo $ttime2 dnf info 389-ds-base-devel dnf info 389-ds-base-help ttime3=`date +"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"` echo $ttime3 dnf info 389-ds-base-legacy-tools dnf info 389-ds-base-snmp dnf info A-Tune-BPF-Collection dnf info BareBonesBrowserLaunch ttime4=`date +"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"` echo $ttime4 dnf info BareBonesBrowserLaunch-javadoc dnf info CUnit dnf info CUnit-devel dnf info CUnit-help dnf info ComputeLibrary dnf info ComputeLibrary-devel dnf info ComputeLibrary-sample-data dnf info DCF dnf info GConf2 dnf info GConf2-devel dnf info GeoIP-GeoLite-data dnf info GeoIP-devel dnf info GeoIP-help dnf info GraphicsMagick dnf info GraphicsMagick-devel dnf info GraphicsMagick-help dnf info GraphicsMagick-perl ttime5=`date +"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"` echo $ttime5 #cat openEuler.repo
#cat openEuler.repo.bak
FEOF
